resources.string: Push ups rate per minute report
To start the training, simply position the phone close to your head and start the first push up.
To start the training, simply hit the button with your chin when in lower position to make the count.
If you miss a count, do not worry about it as you will have a change to correct the number when you are finish.
Congratulation! You have achieved a new record of %s push ups within 1 training session!
YES! You did more push ups than the last session!
BRAVO! You have pushed yourself to a new power limit: %d per minute
Well done! You have complete this training session.
This advertisement is temporarily cleared for your hard work!
Impressive!!! You have done %d push ups in one go! Keep up the power!!
Fantastic!! You have break your own best record!!

Push Ups Diary Android App

This privacy policy governs the use of the software application Push Ups Diary (“App”) for mobile devices that was created by WeryNg (“Developer”).

What information do we collect?

The Developer does not intentionally collect or make use of any information including device’s GPS location, phone contacts, emails, clipboards from your device or provided by you via the App.

Third party links and advertisement

Occasionally, the app may include or offer third party products or services. These third party app links have separate and independent privacy policies. Developer therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these apps. Nonetheless, the Developer seek to protect the user experience on the app and welcome any feedback regarding these promotion links. To ensure the best user experience for new user, the app will be ads-free for a few days after installation. You have an option to remove ads by purchasing the ads-free version using the button below.

Your consent

By using the app, you consent to this privacy policy

Feedback

Please use the Contact Developer button below for feedback or feature request. Any feedback and contributions are welcome.
